title: DJ Sona Bug
body:
Proud DJ Sona owner & still love it, thanks Rito ^^

Anyway one game i had a team-mate with DJ Sona, So i wanted to tune-in; opened the tab & the "Music Button" is there & it works BUT it's a Black Square.

Just a minor Visual Bug

replies.body:
Hey 0sergo! 

Thanks for the report! ^-^ 

We're aware of this issue and are working to resolve it!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=bVimXaay,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-30T19:59:48.150+0000)
>
> Hey 0sergo! 
> 
> Thanks for the report! ^-^ 
> 
> We're aware of this issue and are working to resolve it!

your welcome ^^
